head.title: In the Region: Long Island; Recent Sales

hedline.hl1: In the Region: Long Island; Recent Sales

block.p: Bayport 125,000
156 Fairview Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 61-year-old ranch; sunporch, basement, detached 2-car garage; taxes $3,500. Bluepoint 150,000
76 Division Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 122-year-old Victorian; dining room, family room, inground pool, barn; taxes $4,000. East Meadow 159,000

86 Atlantic Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 30-year-old split level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, inground pool; taxes $5,400. Sayville 152,500
